author: Harmeet Kaur, CNN
title: Yes, we long have referred to disease outbreaks by geographic places. Here's why we shouldn't anymore
description: History has shown naming diseases after places can have negative consequences for nations, economies and people. And as times change, language does too.
content:
By Harmeet Kaur, CNN
Updated 4:50 AM ET, Sat March 28, 2020
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
(CNN)What's in a (virus) name?
